start_text: We need your feedback so we can improve this course in the next semester. Thanks for your help!

choices.title: explained well
choices.off_text: how could the lecturer improve his explanations?

choices.title: was clearly structured
choices.off_text: how could we restructure the lecture that it makes more sense?

choices.title: contained information useful to me
choices.off_text: what would have been useful for you to learn today?
choices.on_text: what was the most useful you have learnt today?

choices.title: did not contain terminology unknown to me
choices.off_text: which term(s) should we explain the next time?

choices.title: sufficiently prepared me for the exercises
choices.off_text: what should we include in the lecture that it helps you solve the exercises best?

questions.title: next semester, the lecture should be

choices.title: were clearly formulated
choices.off_text: can you tell us of a specific question which was poorly formulated?

choices.title: were solvable
choices.off_text: how can we prepare you better for the exercises?

choices.title: helped to improve my skills
choices.on_text: which question did you like best?

choices.title: were easy understandable
choices.off_text: how can we improve our solutions?

questions.title: next semester, additional exercises should be
questions.max_text: JOIN US, we need you! At the end of the questionnaire, you can leave us your E-Mail :)

questions.title: next semester, the focus should be

choices.title: was well organized
choices.off_text: how can we improve our organisation?

choices.title: fulfilled my expectations
choices.off_text: what should have been included in the course which wasn't?

choices.title: will be recommended by me to others

questions.title: I want to get to know TheAlt better!
